item.title: ETFS Capital 批评 WisdomTree 战略，对董事会发起 "扣留运动
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一封信，ETFS Capital 要求 WisdomTree 的股东在重新选举这家美国资产管理公司的部分董事会成员时弃权，并称如果该公司经营得更好，其股价至少可以飙升 70%。【原文：ETFS Capital asked shareholders of WisdomTree to abstain from re-electing some board members of the U.S. asset manager, saying its stock could surge at least 70% if it were run better, according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 聚焦：哥伦比亚政策摇摆不定，投资受挫，经济增长面临风险
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）的政策摇摆不定，导致投资急剧下降，预计今年仍将继续，因为一些企业主抱怨战略规划几乎变得不可能。【原文：Colombian President Gustavo Petro's track record of unpredictable policy lurches has contributed to a sharp drop in investment that is expected to continue this year, as some business owners complain strategic planning has become almost impossible.】

item.title: 埃森哲下调年度收入预期
item.description: IT服务提供商埃森哲周四下调了2024财年的收入预期，原因是不确定的经济形势促使客户削减了对其咨询服务的支出。【原文：IT services provider Accenture cut its fiscal-year 2024 revenue forecast on Thursday, as an uncertain economy prompts clients to cut spending on its consulting services.】

item.title: 巴西咖啡产量将出现罕见的连续增长
item.description: 根据路透社汇编的数据，巴西今年的咖啡产量预计将实现第三次年度增长，在这个世界上最大的咖啡豆种植国和出口国 144 年的咖啡历史中，这种罕见的情况仅出现过七次。【原文：Brazil is expected to post its third annual increase in coffee production this year, a rare sequence seen only seven times in 144 years of coffee history in the world's largest grower and exporter of the beans, according to data compiled by Reuters.】

item.title: 大多数券商坚持美联储 6 月开始降息的预测
item.description: 美国央行在 3 月 19-20 日的会议上维持利率不变，并维持今年降息三次的预测，大多数主要券商坚持美联储将从 6 月开始降息的预期。【原文：Most major brokerages stuck by their expectations that the Federal Reserve will start lowering interest rates from June after the U.S. central bank left interest rates unchanged at its March 19-20 meeting and maintained its projection of three cuts this year.】

item.title: Reddit 首次公开募股定价在区间最高点，将迎来炙手可热的首次亮相
item.description: 社交媒体平台 Reddit 周四在纽约证券交易所高调上市，为其他希望在今年上市的公司创造了条件，同时也检验了投资者对新股的偏好。【原文：Social media platform Reddit geared up for its high-profile market debut on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday, setting the stage for other companies looking to go public this year, while testing investor appetite for new issues.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社称，塔吉特今年有望将奖金翻番
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，大型零售商塔吉特（Target）今年将把受薪员工的奖金提高一倍。【原文：Big-box retailer Target is doubling the bonuses for its salaried employees this year, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港外企警惕新安保法，加强应急计划
item.description: 香港新国家安全法中有关国家机密和与外国实体联系的模糊条款，让这个金融中心的许多全球企业惶恐不安，一些咨询公司和对冲基金更新了应急计划，并寻求法律建议，以应对这一政治风险。【原文：Vague provisions in Hong Kong's new national security law around state secrets and links to foreign entities have put on edge many global businesses in the financial hub, with some consultants and hedge funds updating contingency plans and seeking legal advice in a bid to counter this political risk.】

item.title: 美国最高银行监管机构将公布合并政策提案
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司周四将成为最新一家提出银行兼并新政策的美国监管机构，因为中型贷款机构仍处于不稳定状态。【原文：The U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation on Thursday is set to become the latest American regulator to propose new policies for mergers among banks amid the instability that continues to rattle midsize lenders.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁格奥尔基耶娃敦促央行在大选年降息压力下保持独立性
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周四警告说，在大选年，各国央行面临着越来越大的降息政治压力，但决策者需要保持其独立性。【原文：International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva warned on Thursday that central banks face growing political pressure to cut interest rates during a major election year but policymakers need to maintain their independence.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，CapOne 告诉监管机构 Discover 交易将促进竞争和稳定
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Capital One 在其监管申请中表示，该公司与 Discover Financial 353 亿美元的合并将促进竞争，并有利于金融稳定。【原文：Capital One's $35.3 billion merger with Discover Financial will boost competition and be good for financial stability, the bank says in its regulatory application, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 早间竞价：市场从美联储不放松和瑞士央行跳水中受益
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美光公司因人工智能需求引导强劲预期和意外盈利而创下历史新高
item.description: 美光科技（Micron Technology）周四在盘前交易中股价大涨 15.7%，此前该公司公布了意外盈利，并预计当前季度营收将高于华尔街预期，原因是用于人工智能计算的内存芯片需求飙升。【原文：Micron Technology's shares surged 15.7% in premarket trading on Thursday after the company posted a surprise profit and forecast current-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on soaring demand for its memory chips used in AI computing.】

item.title: 机构开始审查美国最大航空公司如何使用个人信息
item.description: 美国运输部（USDOT）正在对美国最大的 10 家航空公司收集、处理和使用乘客个人信息的方式进行审查。【原文：The U.S. Department of Transportation (USDOT) is opening a review of how the 10 largest U.S. airlines collect, handle and use the personal information of passengers.】

item.title: 美联储坚持降息预期，期货上涨；美光反弹提振芯片制造商
item.description: 美国股指期货周四上涨，原因是芯片制造商追随美光科技（Micron Technology）的大幅上涨，而且投资者对美联储坚持今年降息三次的观点感到欣慰。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Thursday as chipmakers tracked sharp gains in Micron Technology and investors took comfort in the Federal Reserve sticking to its three-rate-cut view for this year.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，现代和起亚将因充电装置损坏召回美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周四表示，现代汽车美国公司和起亚汽车美国公司将召回合计14.71万辆美国汽车，原因是这些汽车的充电装置可能会损坏并导致驱动力损失。【原文：Hyundai Motor America and Kia America are recalling a combined 147,100 U.S. vehicles over a charging unit that may become damaged and result in loss of drive power, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Thursday.】

item.title: PMI显示：英国企业继续复苏，但价格仍令人担忧
item.description: 周四的一项调查显示，英国企业本月继续保持从衰退中复苏的势头，但顽固的价格压力可能会支持英国央行对利率采取观望态度。【原文：British businesses kept up their recovery from recession this month but stubborn price pressures could bolster the Bank of England's wait-and-see approach to interest rates, a survey showed Thursday.】

item.title: 挪威维持利率不变，期待秋季降息
item.description: 挪威央行周四维持基准利率在4.50%不变，这是分析师的一致预期，并表示计划今年只下调一次借贷成本，低于大多数经济学家的预期。【原文：Norway's central bank kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged at 4.50% on Thursday, as unanimously expected by analysts, and signalled it plans a single cut to the cost of borrowing this year, less than anticipated by most economists.】

item.title: 法院顾问称，欧盟法院应支持 Illumina 针对欧盟审查 Grail 交易提出的上诉
item.description: 欧洲最高法院的一位顾问周四表示，欧洲最高法院应支持美国基因测序公司Illumina就欧盟反垄断监管机构对其71亿美元收购癌症测试制造商Grail的审查提出的上诉。【原文：Europe's top court should back U.S. gene sequencing company Illumina's appeal against the EU antitrust regulators' review of its $7.1 billion bid for cancer test maker Grail , an adviser to the court said on Thursday.】

item.title: 在 Z/Yen 金融中心调查中，纽约保持第一，伦敦第二
item.description: 周四，Z/Yen 最新发布的全球金融中心排名显示，纽约轻松蝉联全球顶级金融中心，在过去六年里连续超越伦敦，位居第二，超过新加坡，巩固了自己的地位。【原文：New York easily remains the world's top financial centre, cementing its position for the past six years after it overtook London, in second place ever since, ahead of Singapore, the latest Z/Yen rankings of global financial centres showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本五十铃汽车公司将在泰国生产电动皮卡车
item.description: 泰国政府发言人周四表示，日本汽车制造商五十铃汽车公司计划将泰国作为其电动版 D-MAX 皮卡的生产基地，并计划于明年开始出口。【原文：Japanese automaker Isuzu Motors plans to use Thailand as a production base for an electric version of its D-MAX pickup truck, with a plan to start exports next year, a Thai government spokesperson said on Thursday.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行意外降息四分之一个百分点
item.description: 瑞士国家银行周四将其主要利率下调 25 个基点至 1.50%，这一出人意料的举措使其成为第一家回调旨在应对通胀的紧缩货币政策的主要央行。【原文：The Swiss National Bank cut its main interest rate by 25 basis points to 1.50% on Thursday, a surprise move which made it the first major central bank to dial back tighter monetary policy aimed at tackling inflation.】

item.title: 美联储对日本央行放鸽子，日股创新高，日元反弹
item.description: 在美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）在近期通胀数据升温的情况下仍坚持宽松政策后，日本日经平均指数（Nikkei share average）周四创下历史新高，日元也从四个月低点反弹。【原文：Japan's Nikkei share average hit a record high on Thursday and the yen rebounded from a four-month low, after the U.S. Federal Reserve stuck to its easing path despite recent heated inflation readings.】

item.title: 日航计划购买 42 架飞机，目录价格为 124 亿美元
item.description: 日本航空公司（Japan Airlines）周四表示，为提高燃油效率并计划扩大国际服务，该公司计划在 2025 年 4 月至 2034 年 3 月期间购买 42 架喷气式飞机，目录价格约为 123.9 亿美元。【原文：Japan Airlines plans to buy 42 jets from April 2025 to March 2034 with a catalogue price of about $12.39 billion as it seeks higher fuel efficiency and plans to expand international services, the airline said on Thursday.】

item.title: ACEA 称 2 月份欧盟新车销量同比增长 10.1
item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商协会周四表示，2月份欧盟新车销量同比增长10.1%，欧盟主要市场均实现稳健增长。【原文：New car sales in the European Union rose 10.1% year-on-year in February, with the bloc's main markets all recording solid growth, Europe's automakers association said on Thursday.】

item.title: 宝马预计 2024 年汽车利润率与上年持平
item.description: 宝马公司周四在年度报告中表示，由于这家德国高档汽车制造商预计研发（R&D）成本和资本支出将在今年达到峰值，2024 年的汽车利润率将与去年持平。【原文：BMW sees its 2024 automotive margin in line with last year as the German premium carmaker expects research and development (R&D) costs and capital expenditures to peak this year, it said in the annual report on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储前景稳定提振股市对 "软着陆 "的憧憬
item.description: 尽管经济增长强于预期，但美联储仍坚持了 2024 年的降息预期，这让处于纪录高位的美国股市收到了令人鼓舞的信息。【原文：A U.S. stock market perched at record highs received an encouraging message from the Federal Reserve, after the central bank stuck with its rate cut projections for 2024 despite stronger-than-expected economic growth.】

item.title: 早间竞标：三次会议结束，剩下的会议开始
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 聚焦：腾讯的下一个升级： 减少国外大型特许经营游戏，增加自研游戏
item.description: 在中国腾讯公司发生的一场巨变中，一款简单易玩的可爱角色闯关游戏，已经取代了为智能手机开发大制作的外国特许经营游戏。【原文：In a sea change at China's Tencent , an easy-to-play game of cute characters tackling obstacle courses has taken precedence over developing a big-budget sophisticated foreign franchise for smartphones.】

item.title: 新规提高门槛，中国消费贷款机构将面临洗牌
item.description: 中国收紧了对消费金融公司的规定，这很可能会迫使这个市值约 1200 亿美元的行业进行整合，因为该行业为数百万被传统银行拒之门外的人提供高息贷款。【原文：China's tightening of rules for consumer finance companies is likely to force consolidation in the roughly $120 billion sector that provides high-interest loans for millions of people shut out of traditional banking.】
